author: uschindler
msg: Fix javadocs of Fields.size(), use FilteredIterator from StoredFields branch. Return -1 for Fields.size() in FieldFilterAtomicReader. If this breaks some test, we found a bug and have to change test to respect -1 (which is valid return value)

author: adrianc
msg: 2. Consolidated/separated the Commons Daemon implementation - this just makes it easier to distinguish it from the rest of the code.
3. Changed some public methods to private, and added a private constructor.
These changes are in preparation for enabling client code to query the class for the server's state.

author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3312: Small refctoring and final field
